Advanced combat bipod is designed specifically for the M16/M4 weapon families. Attached directly to the MIL-STD 1913 MWS (SOPMOD) rail system, no separate adapters necessary.

At the top of the inner leg is a button, which fits into the detents in the outer legs. The inner legs are extended by simply pulling them out.
